text: Moses Mabhida Stadium is a sports stadium in Durban, South Africa. It was built in 2009. == FIFA World Cup == The stadium co-hosted the 2010 FIFA World Cup. It is one of the 10 stadiums where World Cup matches were played. FIFA calls this stadium Durban Stadium. 2010 World Cup Matches All times are given in South African Standard time (UTC+2). title: Moses Mabhida Stadium
